name: Warriors Cats: Untold Tales
description:
Warrior Cats: Untold Tales is a digital reimagining of the world of the Warrior Cats. Enter a virtual experience where you can create your own Warrior and explore an open world.

Available exclusively for Windows computers.

Enter the iconic Forest Territory and become a warrior of ThunderClan, ShadowClan, WindClan, or RiverClan.

Or, set out on your own as a Loner and start your own Clan.
Stalk your prey! Hunt rabbits, mice, frogs, thrushes, fish, and squirrels. Battle invaders, participate in patrols, or aid the local medicine cat.

Attend the Gathering at Fourtrees, visit the Moonstone, and make friends back at camp.

Court a cat of your choosing and find a mate. Have a kitten of your very own and raise them to be loyal to their Clan. Your family may even give you a present or two!

Choose from an extensive variety of colors and pelt patterns to make your cat unique. Customize your character with a variety of skills and level up your feline prowess!

Become a kittypet and explore the Twolegplace, collect potent herbs, explore famous landmarks, and more in Warrior Cats: Untold Tales.
